verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Baba Baba Baba yetu
uliye mbinguni,
Jina lako litukuzwe Baba, x2
litukuzwe.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Utakalo lifanyike -
Baba yetu uliye mbinguni.
Duniani hata na mbinguni -
Baba yetu uliye mbinguni.
Utupe leo mkate wetu -
Baba yetu uliye mbinguni.
Tusamehe na makosa yetu -
Baba yetu uliye mbinguni.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kama vile tuwasameheavyo -
Baba yetu uliye mbinguni.
Wale wote walotukosea -
Baba yetu uliye mbinguni
Usitutie kishawishini -
Baba yetu uliye mbinguni.
Maovuni Baba utuopoe -
Baba yetu uliye mbinguni.
